// do not edit the settingsVersion property!
settingsVersion=4.2

// when you are ready go back to t-ui and type "restart" to see changes

// skin
deviceColor=#ffff9800
inputColor=#ff00ff00
outputColor=#ffffffff
backgroundColor=#ff004d40
useSystemFont=false
fontSize=15
ramColor=#fff44336
inputFieldBottom=true
username=edit_this_in_t-ui_folder
showUsername=true
showSubmit=true
deviceName=null
showRam=true
showDevice=true
suggestionBg=#ffffffff
suggestionColor=#ff000000
transparentSuggestions=false

// pre-load
useSystemWallpaper=false
fullscreen=false
keepAliveWithNotification=true
openKeyboardOnStart=true

// music
playRandom=true
songsFolder=/sdcard/Music

// others
closeOnDbTap=true
showSuggestions=true
